title: 02/21/22 DPS Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason McIntyre Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/21/22 DPS Hour 1 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason McIntyre Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Jason react to the melee between the Michigan and Wisconsin college basketball teams, and what the appropriate discipline will be for Michigan head coach Juwan Howard. The guys talk about the NBA's All-Star weekend and LeBron James saying that the door is not closed on a return to Cleveland. Doug and Jason also discuss the injury to Suns PG Chris Paul and how him being out six to eight weeks impacts the Suns and the rest of the teams in the western conference.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
